text: The 3rd Cruiser Squadron was a formation of cruisers of the British Royal Navy from 1902 to 1909 and 1911 to 1916 and then again from 1922 to 1941. ==History== ===First formation=== The squadron was first formed in June 1902 and disbanded in March 1909 ====Rear-Admiral Commanding==== Included: {| class="wikitable" ! !!
